name: DESERT SOULS
description:
DESERT SOULS is a 2-player co-operative boss battle where two adventurers must work together (and try their best to not impair one another) in order to defeat a formidable foe!

Created in a month with my mates for a uni project, with me doing the game design, VFX and programming.

Made in conjunction with

Jarod - @JarodPearce on Twitter (Animator, Character Artist)

Veronica - @10_mui06 on Twitter (Environment Artist, Boss Texture Artist, UI Designer)

David - @daviddchen on Twitter (Score & SFX Artist, Voice Actor)
